data.body:


[AUTO][ci skip]: updating cocos2dx_files.json
change option from CHIPMUNK to BOX2D doesn't have any effect
data.body:
Hi,

Before created new project I change CMakeList regarding Physics Engine:

option(USE_CHIPMUNK "Use chipmunk for physics library" OFF)
option(USE_BOX2D "Use box2d for physics library" ON)

next I started work on new project but every preprocessor definitions are still set tu chipmunk 
attachment from grep: 
$ grep -rIn CC_ENABLE_CHIPMUNK_INTEGRATION ./\* --exclude *.cpp  --exclude *.h

[chipmunkGrep.txt](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/files/211760/chipmunkGrep.txt)

problem exist on cocos2d-x-3.10 and cocos2d-x-3.9

As a workaround I set preprocessor definition by sed command and rebuild project
$ grep -rIl CC_ENABLE_CHIPMUNK_INTEGRATION ./\* --exclude *.cpp  --exclude *.h | xargs sed -i 's/CC_ENABLE_CHIPMUNK_INTEGRATION/CC_ENABLE_BOX2D_INTEGRATION/g'

// br Greg  :)

data.title: Make PageView page turning event time tweak configurable.
data.body:
This change allows user to tweak when the page turning event is raised.
Even with the existing tweak, it seemed to me that the event was raised a bit late. So instead of changing the hard-coded value, I added a way to set a different value for the tweak.

data.title: lua 正常调用函数会报一个错误
data.body:
lua_cocos2dx_auto.cpp  文件里的`lua_cocos2dx_GLProgramState_setUniformFloat`函数,第一个参数即可以是整数也可以是字符串，但如果第一个参数字符串，当程序运行到

```
 ok &= luaval_to_int32(tolua_S, 2,(int *)&arg0, "cc.GLProgramState:setUniformFloat");
```

会报一个错误，break，然后运行是字符串情况下的代码。这是正常的调用函数过程。如果游戏中每帧都调用`setUniformFloat`，打印出来的log将变的非常的恶心。而且没啥问题报一个error也不太合理。类似的函数挺多的。
